issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
DistCp when used with dynamic strategy does not update the chunkFilePath and other static variables any time other than for the first job. This is seen when DistCp::run() is used. 

A single copy succeeds but multiple jobs finish successfully without any real copying.
fields.summary: DistCp has incorrect chunkFilePath for multiple jobs when strategy is dynamic

comments.body: This patch modifies the static members of DynamicInputChunk to non-static so that two different DistCp jobs when called via run() or execute do not use wrong chunkRootPath values.
[~mithun] Request you to review. Thanks!
